mapper.select: select count(*) from multi_staff where e_code = #{eCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_MULTI.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into multi_staff (s_id,s_name,e_code,departs_id,job_no,card_no,create_time,last_time) values (#{sid},#{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{eCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{departsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from multi_staff where e_code = #{eCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and job_no = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
